page.title: 06EMERGENCY SERVICES
page.content:
FIRE STATION The fire station has 1 fire engine which cost around Â£25000. There are 12 volunteer firemen who are on call 24 hours a day.
AMBULANCE STATION There are 3 ambulances which cost around Â£20000 each including the extra equipment needed.There are 7 ambulance men working voluntarily.
POLICE STATION There are 4 police cars, each costing Â£4500. A uniform costs Â£250. Shifts are:6am_2pm, 2_10pm and 10pm_6am.
HEALTH CENTRE 22 people work in the health centre. They include doctors, dentists and health visitors. The equipment in the health centre costs about Â£15000.
